Newcastle Scalable Computing

Scalable Group Seminars

This website documents the seminar series of the Scalable Computing research group at Newcastle University.

To coincide with the School of Computing Science’s move to the Urban Sciences Building, the Scalable Seminars will adjourn until September.

If you wish to participate, please contact Matt Forshaw or raise a Pull Request on Github here.

Previous Seminars

Date Title Speaker
July 17, 2017 Visualization Tools and Techniques Prof Nick Holliman
June 19, 2017 To See What Isn’t There – Visualization of Missing Data Dr Sara Johansson Fernstad
June 5, 2017 Sentiment Analysis using Probabilistic Topic Modelling and Unsupervised Deep Learning Dr Stephen McGough
May 8, 2017 Automating Computational Placement in IoT Environments Peter Michalák
